long_description: The XXL Traveller Hammock is the largest hammock Byer has ever offered. It's extra wide and long, yet it weighs only 1 lb. 8 oz. and fits into a small stuff sack. Hammock measures 125 x 90 in., providing plenty of room for 2 people. Strong nylon material has a 375-lb. weight capacity.
short_description: The XXL Traveller Hammock is the largest hammock Byer has ever offered. It's extra wide and long, yet it weighs only 1 lb. 8 oz. and fits into a small stuff sack.
